### Research Methodology (8-Step Process)

| Step | Action                            | Time Allocation |
| ---- | --------------------------------- | --------------- |
| 1    | Identify Brand & Initial Inputs   | 1-2 min         |
| 2    | Source Data Collection (Website)  | 5-8 min         |
| 3    | Deep Intelligence (LinkedIn, Crunchbase) | 8-12 min |
| 4    | Verification & Crossâ€‘Check        | 3-5 min         |

| 6    | Company Overview Compilation      | 2-3 min         |
| 7    | Stakeholder Contact Gathering     | 3-5 min         |
| 8    | Final Review & Report Generation  | 2-3 min         |

**Total Time**: 25-35 minutes
